body.name: Ram (Devil's Fury MC 12): A Dixie Reapers Bad Boys Romance
body.description: Talia -- Every man in my life, including my father, has betrayed me. My past has made me cynical, twisted my mind, and left bruises that will never fade. Then I’m kidnapped and this big biker swoops in to save the day. I watch as he kills four men, and the blood on his hands should terrify me. Seeing how kind he is when rescuing everyone, how he takes charge and won’t leave anyone behind, makes me wonder if not all men are useless. He says I can trust him, and he wants me to stick around. I’ve always run before, but something about this man makes me want to give him a chance. I only hope I won’t regret it.Ram -- I left my club and never planned to go back. They thought I was dead, and I wanted to keep it that way. But things don’t always go according to plan. I roll up to the gates with six women in tow. One of them I’d love to claim as my own. She’s prickly and defensive, but I find her utterly adorable. I want to keep her, but she pushes me away. When one of the other victims asks to stay with me, I know it’s my one chance to convince Talia to give me a shot. Now I’ve gone from a vigilante with no home to a family man. No matter how many men I have to kill, I will do whatever it takes to keep them safe. Never again will someone hurt those who are precious to me.WARNING: Ram (Devil’s Fury MC) is intended for readers 18+ due to adult content and situations, including human trafficking and mentions of abuse. Reader discretion is advised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ram and Talia
reviews.reviewText: Ram aka Montgomery Cash certainly wasn’t planning on going back to the Devil’s Fury. When he rescues six women/children, he knows his brothers will have his back. There is one woman that has a fire to her. Talia can’t trust any man. They have all lied to her. When Ram shows up and saves not only her but five others, what can she think? I love that the Badger kept in contact with Ram. He certainly was surprised to hear about Grizzles passing. Ram is more shocked to find out how the club is doing. Riley is the youngest and also someone important in this story. We also have Heather, Anna, Marci, and Renata. I’m sure each will have a story. Since Stitches will be next. We already know Marci will be with him. We also have someone new I didn’t know about, Max aka Lock. He is one of Ram’s friends. I have to say, they need to do something about Farrah and Mariah. Farrah is way too stuck up. In the beginning I liked her being so outgoing but now. She is acting like a prim donna. Let us hope things will change soon and wake her up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like Talia a lot. She's defensive, prickly, but she's had reasons to be that way. Ram coming in to the rescue and showing patience with Talia tells us exactly what type of man he is. These Devil’s Fury bikers like danger but also their women. They don't second guess, nothing in life. They've come so far, and I love their growth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This book was good, just a bit different than most of this series. Good characters and plot along with good twists and turns. I felt the book was really more about Ram's daughter than Ram and his woman. While it was really good, it would have been better if it had been a little longer and added more about the couple.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Happy to read and re-read
reviews.reviewText: I loved this book! I actually purchase any books by this author on sight as I love a good Alpha where they hold on, say you’re mine, Insta- love, all in book. Harley Wylde delivers that and does it very well. This book, however, had a more thoughtful, Gentle, responsive Hero in Ram. He seemed to think about his actions, reactions, and how they would affect others and the heroine. He was also a bit more methodical and used his “mom’s psychology” background to his standard’s betterment. Talia was also a little more rounded and questioned Ram’s motivation enough to make him prove himself. It seemed to make this love story less rushed, but still gave me the happy ending that we all crave.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ram and talia
reviews.reviewText: Ram is out to get Vega who takes girls and rapes and abuse, he finally kills him. He rescues these girls from their cages, Talia doesn't trust him or any man for she was abused by them or they took from her so she lost trust. Anyways, theirs this young girl who attaches on to her and Ram, her name is Riley. Come to find out Riley is Ram's daughter from a lady name Reba who Ram got her pregant, he never knew about Riley. They start having a relationship with and they also become a family after all the crap they went thru.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved it so very much!
reviews.reviewText: Ram and Talia's story was another great addition to the world of HW! Ram had spent years atoning for his sins. Hunting the worst of the worst, the evil scum that traffic women and kids has let him sleep at night. He never expected it would bring the woman meant for him into his life. He couldn't have imagined it would lead him back to the Devil's Fury. Talia was smart and so strong, she was just perfect for Ram. Loved it so very much!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This was a nice change with familiar characters
reviews.reviewText: I really liked this story. It was just enough change to keep me interested in the story and I loved that Talia was so strong. I also loved that it brought back a lot of old characters. I was kind of sad to see what Mariah had turned into though because I'd really liked her and how different she was from her sister in her book with Savage. Overall great story!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does NOT disappoint ❤️❤️
reviews.reviewText: Harley Wylde is one of my favorite authors! I’ve read all her MC series (minus the shifter series) and I’m always waiting for the next book to drop!Harley once again hit this one out of the park! I really loved the connection Ram and Talia shared. While Talia is strong and smart she has a hard time trusting people. Ram knows she’s his and their connection is special but he doesn’t push her too hard and is understanding so while you still get a good dose of alpha the way he handles her is softer then other MMC in Harley other books but don’t let that fool you into thinking he’s going to let her walk all over him. I seriously can’t say enough good things about this book! I’m already ready for the next one! ❤️
